GSD.product_version: versions from v4.9 to before v4.19.191
GSD.description:
bus: qcom: Put child node before return

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.191 by commit a399dd80e697a02cfb23e2fc09b87849994043d9, it was introduced in version v4.9 by commit 335a127548081322bd2b294d715418648912f20c. For more details please see the references link.
